title: RESULTS - EURO 2020 QUALIFIERS: World champions France edge past Iceland
text:
France face a crucial clash in their bid to qualify for next summer's European Championship as they take on group rivals Iceland on a busy night of qualifiers.

The world champions are part of three teams including their opponents and Turkey separated by just three points in Group H and victory would put them well on course to reaching next summer's finals.

Also in action are European champions Portugal who hope to remain on course to qualify for Group B when they host Luxembourg. Follow all the action on a night featuring seven qualifying games across Europe.
description: France face a crucial clash in their bid to qualify for next summer's European Championship as they take on group rivals Iceland on a busy night of qualifiers. Follow all of Europe's action here.
